info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 10 at 11:18PM CDT until April 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WESTERN GUADALUPE...NORTHEASTERN BEXAR AND SOUTHEASTERN COMAL COUNTIES... At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Schertz, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. One inch hail was reported in northwest San Antonio and also in Live Oak. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Randolph AFB, San Antonio Int Airport, Kirby, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Hollywood Park, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, Marion, and Santa Clara. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
